metadata.synopsis: A player left a Netherstone on the ground inside the Steel Watch Foundry before they blew it up.The player spots the looters who have the Netherstones. The Emperor tells them they must get the stones back.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Load CTY_Main_AGo to steel watch foundryGet at least one stone through the debug book (Emperor Prelude)Drop at least one inside the steel watch foundry buildingSetGlobalOsirisFlag IRN_IronThrone_State_DestroyedWalk to the Looters (should see Netherstone icons on map)

0.text: There - the kobolds have it! Get them before they escape!

1.text: There - the kobolds have the stones! Get them before they escape!
